mapper.update: UPDATE t_carport t1 SET t1.owner_id = 0 WHERE t1.deleted = 0 AND t1.owner_id = #{ownerId}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.real_name , t2.phone,t3.licence ,t4.park_name, t4.address from t_carport t1 LEFT JOIN t_owner t2 ON t2.id = t1.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_car t3 ON t3.id = t1.car_id LEFT JOIN t_park t4 ON t4.id = t1.park_id where t1.deleted=0 and t1.status!=0 and t1.owner_id in (select id from t_owner where deleted = 0 and state = 1 and user_id = #{userId})
